award_title: Collaborative Research: Subauroral atmospheric and ionospheric dynamics at the edge of space
subject: Getting credit when others actually use your simulation code
body:
Multi-site simulation code that's hard to reproduce, outputs too big for supplements - even when people cite your work, they're usually rebuilding from scratch.

We built Ouro as a thin API layer over computational workflows. Other researchers can call your methods directly instead of recreating them. You get visibility into actual reuse, not just citation counts.

Happy to show you how it works.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
